titleStmt.title: An answer to the arguments of the Iewes, in which they go about to prove that the Messiah is not come in which answer it is proved that the Messiah is, and hath been come about 1661 years : and theirs and other arguments of the Christians laid aside, which is not to the purpose.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: An answer to the arguments of the Iewes, in which they go about to prove that the Messiah is not come in which answer it is proved that the Messiah is, and hath been come about 1661 years : and theirs and other arguments of the Christians laid aside, which is not to the purpose.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed: G.F. at end and George Fox on p. 51.
Place of publication and printer from colophon; date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
